original: intros v u H1 H2 H3 H4. destruct H1 as [lv H1]. destruct H2 as [lu H2]. intros H5. intros H6. unfold ex_Rbar_div in H6. unfold ex_Rbar_mult in H6. destruct H6 as [x H6]. apply ex_lim_seq_mult in H6; auto. apply ex_Rbar_div in H4. destruct H4 as [A B]. destruct A as [C D]. apply ex_lim_seq_minus in C; auto. apply ex_lim_seq_inv in D; auto. apply ex_Rbar_mult in H6. destruct H6 as [y H6]. apply ex_Rbar_mult in H6. destruct H6 as [z H6]. apply ex_lim_seq_inv in H6; auto. exists y. apply is_lim_seq_div' with (l1:=lv) (l2:=lu) in H1; auto.
